subject: 🏥 Practice Loans That Support Your Vision
body:
Hi {name},

Whether you're a physician, dentist, chiropractor, or wellness professional — we tailor funding solutions to fit your practice.

✅ Start-up capital
✅ Equipment financing
✅ Working capital
✅ Practice acquisition

We help healthcare providers grow with confidence.

👉 Schedule a call with our CEO, Dr. David Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🧾 Cover Payroll, Rent, and Marketing — Stress-Free
body:
Hi {name},

Need capital to keep your practice running smoothly?

We fund operational expenses like:
- Rent or mortgage
- Payroll and staffing
- Insurance and supplies
- Marketing and patient outreach

No collateral? No problem.

👉 Book your strategy session with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🩺 Upgrade Your Medical or Dental Equipment
body:
Hi {name},

New tech = better care + more patients.

Don’t delay upgrades because of cashflow. We finance:
- Imaging and diagnostic tools
- Dental chairs and laser systems
- Aesthetic and wellness devices

✅ Fast decisions
✅ Low-doc options
✅ Keep your working capital

👉 Let’s discuss your options with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 📈 Expand Your Practice — We’ll Handle the Capital
body:
Hi {name},

Opening a second location or renovating your current one?

We offer loans for:
- Build-outs and construction
- New patient acquisition
- Practice purchases and transitions

Let’s build your practice together.

👉 Schedule your consultation with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min
